guiFX

Class LogBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiFX.LogBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LogBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is used to create a log of what happens during the program operation. It will also save the log to a file
